data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Tierra del Fuego.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tierra del Fuego, Argentina
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 11,175 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.section_summary: On average, 7 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Tierra del Fuego, Argentina.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, help your children in Tierra del Fuego, Argentina find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Tierra del Fuego, Argentina to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Jew, Spanish-speaking people might believe through him.
Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Tierra del Fuego.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Tierra del Fuego, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Tierra del Fuego, Argentina to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

location.name: Tierra del Fuego
location.people_groups_list: Czech, Chane, Arab, Syrian, Japanese, Chulupe
